hero.title: Welcome to Process Manager
hero.subtitle: Create, validate, and track your operational procedures with ease. Designed for YAS technical teams.
hero.info: Sign in with your YAS account to access the tool

benefits.title: Why Use Process Manager?
benefits.subtitle: A simple and efficient tool for managing your operational procedures

structured.title: Structured Procedures
structured.description: Create documents compliant with TG-TELCO-PRO-101 v1.0 format using a guided form

traceability.title: Complete Traceability
traceability.description: Keep history of all modifications and validations with digital signatures

collaboration.title: Teamwork
collaboration.description: Invite colleagues to collaborate with defined roles (Author, Verifier, Validator)

analytics.title: Performance Tracking
analytics.description: Analyze the effectiveness of your procedures with monthly incident reports

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Compliant with YAS standardized format TG-TELCO-PRO-101 v1.0 for network monitoring and service restoration

documentCreation.title: Guided 5-Step Creation
documentCreation.description: Smart form to document: objectives, involved actors, business rules, technical terminology, and detailed procedure with annexes.

contributorManagement.title: Structured Validation Circuit
contributorManagement.description: 3-level workflow (Author → Verifier → Validator) with email invitations, granular permissions, and timestamped digital signatures.

analytics.title: Monthly Efficacy Reports
analytics.description: Import your monthly incident reports and get automatic SLA analysis (P1-P4), resolution rates, and improvement recommendations.

richAnnexes.title: Multimedia Annexes
richAnnexes.description: Integrate network diagrams, configuration tables, screenshots, and technical documentation. Automatic professional PDF export.

collaboration.title: Real-Time Collaboration
collaboration.description: Integrated AI chat for Q&A, automatic notifications, complete modification history, and version management.

pdfExport.title: Automatic Corporate Export
pdfExport.description: Instant PDF generation in YAS format with headers, digital signatures, automatic numbering, and table of contents.

howItWorks.title: From Idea to Validated Document in 4 Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple, structured process for quality procedures

create.title: Create Your Procedure
create.description: Use our 5-step form to document your process. Add objectives, actors, rules, and detailed steps.

collaborate.title: Invite Your Collaborators
collaborate.description: Define who writes, who verifies, and who validates. Send email invitations with specific permissions.

validate.title: Validate with Digital Signatures
validate.description: Each contributor digitally signs their approval. Complete traceability and automatic timestamping.

analyze.title: Measure Field Effectiveness
analyze.description: Import your monthly reports and get KPIs on real performance: resolution rate, SLA compliance, average delays.

feedback.title: Feedback
